A DTO class that encapsulates filter options for tools, providing available types, categories, and platform categories for filtering operations.

## Key Components

- **ToolFilterResponse**: Main response class with Lombok annotations for automatic generation of getters, setters, constructors, and builder pattern
- **types**: List of available tool types for filtering
- **categories**: List of available tool categories for filtering  
- **platformCategories**: List of available platform categories for filtering
- **Swagger annotations**: OpenAPI documentation support with schema descriptions

## Usage Example

```java
// Building a filter response
ToolFilterResponse filterResponse = ToolFilterResponse.builder()
    .types(List.of("API", "Database", "Monitoring"))
    .categories(List.of("Development", "DevOps", "Analytics"))
    .platformCategories(List.of("Cloud", "On-Premise", "Hybrid"))
    .build();

// Accessing filter options
List<String> availableTypes = filterResponse.getTypes();
List<String> availableCategories = filterResponse.getCategories();
List<String> platformOptions = filterResponse.getPlatformCategories();

// Typically returned from a REST endpoint
@GetMapping("/tools/filters")
public ToolFilterResponse getToolFilters() {
    return toolService.getAvailableFilters();
}
```
